entry.title: $2700 // ALL-NEW MODERN OPEN DESIGN _2br _WASHER-DRYER_BROADWAY-36st
entry.content:
IN THE HEART OF ASTORIA BROADWAY
** WASHER--DRYER INSIDE THE APARTMENT**
NEW CONSTRUCTION

2 LARGE BEDROOMS WITH LOTS OF WINDOWS
LARGE LIVING ROOM THAT FITS AN L-SHAPE COUCH.

LARGE MODERN KITCHEN:
HUGE GRAITE ISLAND KITCHEN
STAINLESS STEEL STOVE
STAINLESS STEEL REFRIGERATOR
STAINLESS STEEL DISHWASHER


ALL WOOD FLOORS
TALL CEILINGS

INCLUDES HEAT AND HOT WATER

*** CLOSE TO BOTH TRAIN STATIONS BROADWAY N-W and R - M at STEINWAY STREET !!!

ENJOY ONLY 7 MINUTES INTO MANHATTAN!!!!
ENJOY ONLY 3 MINUTES TO TRAINS
AND SURROUNDED BY MANY DIFFERENT STORES, SUPERMARKETS, BARS, CAFES,
CLUB FITNESS GYM , BLINK FITNESS, LUCILLLE ROBERTS FITNESS, BANKS, STARBUCK, MANY 24 HOUR DRUGS STORES.

ENJOY LIVING CLOSE TO ALL. !!!!!
INCLUDE YOUR TELEPHONE # , AND TIME YOU CAN VIEW IT **
